com.shopify.buy.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shopify.buy.model.ShopifyObject
      • com.shopify.buy.model.Product

  • public class Product
extends ShopifyObject
    A Product is an individual item for sale in a Shopify store.

        public boolean isPublished()

        Returns:

      • getHandle

        public java.lang.String getHandle()
        Returns:

      • getTags

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTags()
        Returns:
        A list of additional categorizations that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching. Each tag has a character limit of 255.

      • getVariants

        public java.util.List<ProductVariant> getVariants()
        Returns:
        A list ProductVariant objects, each one representing a different version of this product.

      • getImages

        public java.util.List<Image> getImages()
        Returns:
        A list of Image objects, each one representing an image associated with this product.

      • hasImage

        public boolean hasImage()
        Returns:
        {code true} if this product has at least one image, false otherwise.

      • getOptions

        public java.util.List<Option> getOptions()
        Returns:
        A list of Option objects, which can be used to select a specific ProductVariant.

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Returns:
        true if this product is in stock and available for purchase, false otherwise.

      • hasDefaultVariant

        public boolean hasDefaultVariant()
        For internal use only.

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(ProductVariant variant)
        Returns the Image for the ProductVariant with the given id
        Parameters:
        variant - the ProductVariant to find the Image
        Returns:
        the Image corresponding to the ProductVariant if one was found, otherwise the Image for the Product. This may return null if no applicable images were found.

      • getVariant

        public ProductVariant getVariant(java.util.List<OptionValue> optionValues)
        Parameters:
        optionValues - A list of OptionValue objects that represent a specific variant selection.
        Returns:
        The ProductVariant that matches the given list of the OptionValues, or null if no such variant exists.

        A product object created using the values in the JSON string.
